unnormalised: India vs. Pakistan cricket match on 15/10/2024 is gonna be a cracker! Everyone's already prepping their chai and snacks. Match starts at 2:30 PM IST, so prepone your plans accordingly!
normalised: India versus Pakistan cricket match on fifteenth October two thousand and twenty four is gonna be a cracker! Everyone's already prepping their chai and snacks. Match starts at two thirty P-M I-S-T, so prepone your plans accordingly!

unnormalised: Don't forget the kabaddi finals are on 20/10/24 at 7 PM. Pretty excited to see which team will lift the trophy. Also, the women's hockey semi-final is scheduled for 18th Oct '24 at 10:00 AM.
normalised: Don't forget the kabaddi finals are on twentieth October two thousand and twenty four at seven P-M. Pretty excited to see which team will lift the trophy. Also, the women's hockey semi-final is scheduled for eighteenth October two thousand and twenty four at ten A-M.

unnormalised: Looks like a busy week for sports fans! Stay tuned to catch all the action live. And oh, the Chennai Marathon is happening on 27/10/2024, starting at 5:00 AM. Make sure to set your alarms!
normalised: Looks like a busy week for sports fans! Stay tuned to catch all the action live. And oh, the Chennai Marathon is happening on twenty seventh October two thousand and twenty four, starting at five A-M. Make sure to set your alarms!
